signInUpModal.title: Login and come to see more
signInUpModal.forgottenPswLink: Give your email address and we'll send you email reset link
signInUpModal.mustSmallCapital: Password must include capital and small letters and also numbers
signInUpModal.mustAtLeastLength: Password must be at least eight letters long

frontpage.whatToRead: , what would you like to read today?

errors.noUserWithEmail: No user found with given email address
errors.emailNotVerified: Email address is not verified, check your email
errors.pswResetLinkSent: Password reset link has been sent to your email. Check your email after waiting for couple of minutes.
errors.pwsCapital: Password must contain upper and lower case letters and also numbers.
errors.pswLength: Password length must be at least eigth chatacters.
errors.pswNoEmptySpaces: Password must not have empty spaces.
errors.newOldSame: New and old passwords are the same
errors.usernameChange: Length of an username must be at least 4 characters

success.userCreated: User successfully created, check your email verification link and follow given instructions

modal.confirmRemoval: All your account information, including bought items, will be removed and you won't be able to restore your account. Confirm deletion by pressing button
modal.afterRemoval: Your account has been removed, you'll be automatically logged out
modal.confirmEmailChange: Check your email. Your email address will be updated after you have verified it from link sent to your newly given email.
modal.autoLogout: You will be automatically logged out

support.contact: Contact support and we will answer shortly
